name: Altergeist Fijialert
effectText: When an "Altergeist" Link Monster is Link Summoned to your field (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 other Link Monster on the field; Special Summon this card from your hand to your zone that target points to, also, for the rest of this turn, that monster is also treated as an "Altergeist" monster. You can only use this effect of "Altergeist Fijialert" once per turn.
